full_text: Beare ha Le Bleck 2016/KER/33669 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN V MONDAY, THE 1ST DAY OF AUGUST 2016/10TH SRAVANA, 1938 Cr1.MC.No. 4844 of 2016 () C.M.P.NO.1164/2016 IN CRIME NO.84/2016 OF MULANTHURUTHY POLICE STATION & FIR NO.211/2016 OF PALLURUTHY POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM. PETITIONER (S) /CLAIM PETITIONERS: 1. SHANMON, AGED 25 YEARS, $/O.MUHAMMED JAMAL, 62/KANDANAMKUZHIYIL, ATHIRAMPUZHA, KOTTAYAM. 2. JABBAR P A, AGED 50 YEARS, $/O.ALI KUNJU, PALLIKUNNEL HOUSE, KANJIRAMATTOM P.O, ERNAKULAM. BY ADVS.SMT.AYSHA YOUSEFF SMT .MOLLY JACOB SRI.JOBI .A.THAMPT SMT.M.KABANI DINESH SRI.SHOUKATH HUSAIN SMT.PRIYANKA SEBASTIAN SMT.ASHIFA TAHTB SRI.C.M.EBRAHIM RESPONDENT (S) /STATE/RESPONDENTS : 1.STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, MULANTHURUTHY, PIN-682314. 2.THE REVENUE DIVISIONAL OFFICER, FORT KOCHI, PIN-682001, 3.SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE PALURUTHI, KOCHI, PIN-682006. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. PUSHPALATH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 01-08-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: mbr/ | aE ye LS Burk: 2016/KER/33669 Cr1.MC.No. 4844 of 2016 () APPENDIX PETITIONER (S) ' ANNEXURES: ANNEXURE 1 : PHOTO COPY OF THE FIR NO 84/2016 OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, PIRAVOM ON 24/1/2016. ANNEXURE 2 : PHOTO COPY OF THE FIR NO 211 OF 2016. ANNEXURE 3 : COPY OF THE ORDER DTD 27TH JUNE 2016 IN CRMC 2472/2016. ANNEXURE 4 : TRUE COPY OF THE LETTER DID 7/7/2016 TO THE SHO PALLURUTHY, KASABA POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE 5 : COPY OF PETITION FILED UNDER SECTION 451 OF CRPC FOR INTERIM CUSTODY OF VEHICLE. RESPONDENT (S)' ANNEXURES: NIL //TRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE mbr/ . bales 2016/KER/33669 RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.Y, J Dated this the 1 day of August, 2016 ORDER 1.By order dated 27.6.2016 in Crl.M.C.No.2472/2016, the order dismissing the application filed by the petitioners seeking interim custody of a vehicle was set aside and the learned Magistrate was directed to pass appropriate orders for releasing the vehicle to the ist petitioner subject to appropriate conditions. The grievance of the petitioners is that in spite of specific orders being passed, the said application has not been considered and disposed of till date. 2.The learned counsel also submits that the said application now stands posted to 9.8.2016. As per the earlier order which is produced as Annexure-3, the Sub Inspector of Police, Kasaba Police Station was also directed to report gare] BES, 2016/KER/33669 Crl.M.C.4844/2016 2 seizure of the vehicle before the learned Magistrate. Having regard to the facts and circumstances, I direct the learned Magistrate to pass orders as directed in Annexure- 3 on 9.8.2016 itself and grant interim custody of the vehicle to the _ petitioners subject to appropriate conditions. Petition is disposed of as above. Sd/- RAJA VIJAYARAGHAVAN.Y. JUDGE vps
